item.description:
Hey all! Please use the direction on this site since google maps and mapquest are wrong!!

So, we've offically decided to move this meetup to the Last Thursday of every month.

We're looking forward to seeing everyone there.

Don't forget to bring any new photo's you've been working on.


Scott


Here are some directions to Teya's studio:

Directions:
from the Pike heading west:
Take exit 10 and take the right side so you are going on Route 12 towards Oxford. Take a right at the light (you can't go anywhere else) where 12 joins with 20. Follow this for under a mile and you'll come to a split where 12 goes one way and 20 goes the other. Take a left onto 12 (you will see a Walmart up ahead and to the left) and follow 12 about 300 yards to the entrance to the building on your right. There are signs for the Authentic Skate Shopand North End Muscle and Fitness out on the road, and a sign over the studio door for Photography by Teya.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography July Meetup
